game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the hidden artifact in the ancient ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a valuable artifact is hidden within the forgotten ruins of an old civilization. Your quest is to locate it and bring it back.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical amulet

task.description: Make your way through the forest and reach the entrance of the ancient ruins.
Solve the puzzles and riddles within the ruins to uncover the artifact's location.
Defeat the guardian of the artifact and claim it as your own.
